content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
I was commanded to google advancements for interstellar travel and found several links related to the topic. I received a new command to google nuclear propulsion, space mining, and advancements in radiation shielding for interstellar travel. My computer returned several relevant links, including NASA's NIAC-funded studies, IAEA's report on nuclear technology for future space missions, and articles on interplanetary spaceflight, space colonization, and mining in space.
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "google", "args": {"query": "nuclear propulsion for interstellar travel"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content='Command google returned: ["https://www.nasa.gov/press-release/nasa-darpa-will-test-nuclear-engine-for-future-mars-missions", "https://www.iaea.org/newscenter/news/nuclear-technology-set-to-propel-and-power-future-space-missions-iaea-panel-says", "https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Interstellar_travel", "https://www.nasa.gov/directorates/spacetech/nuclear-propulsion-could-help-get-humans-to-mars-faster", "https://www.energy.gov/ne/articles/6-things-you-should-know-about-nuclear-thermal-propulsion", "https://www.ans.org/news/article-1294/nuclear-pulse-propulsion-gateway-to-the-stars/", "https://www.nationalacademies.org/ocga/testimony-before-congress/accelerating-deep-space-travel-with-space-nuclear-propulsion", "https://www.researchgate.net/publication/216573468_Interstellar_Spaceflight_Using_Nuclear_Propulsion_And_Advanced_Techniques"]', type='action_result')]
"""
